briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety Study of SPL7013 Gel to Prevent the Recurrence of Bacterial Vaginosis (BV)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Double-blind, Multicentre, Randomised, Placebo-controlled Study to Determine the Efficacy and Safety of SPL7013 Gel to Prevent the Recurrence of Bacterial Vaginosis
summary: A double-blind, phase 3 study to determine the efficacy of SPL7013 Gel when administered on alternate days for 16 weeks, compared to placebo gel in preventing the recurrence of BV in women with a history of recurrent BV.

primaryOutcome.measure: Recurrence of BV Where a Diagnosis of BV is Defined as the Presence of at Least 3 Clinical Findings
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: At or by the Week 16 visit
